question1.q: How long does it take to generate a video?
question1.a: Most videos are generated in 2-5 minutes, depending on length and complexity.

question2.a: We support MP4, MOV, and WebM formats with various resolution options.

question3.q: Can I edit the generated videos?
question3.a: Yes, you can make adjustments and refinements using our built-in editor.

question4.a: Yes, we offer a free trial with 3 video generations to get you started.

question5.a: We support English, Chinese, Japanese, and Spanish for both input and output.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our pricing

q1.question: What are credits and how do they work?
q1.answer: Credits are used to generate videos. Each video generation consumes credits based on length and quality. For example, a 5-second video at 1080p uses approximately 5 credits.

q2.question: Do credits expire?
q2.answer: Subscription credits reset monthly. Purchased credit packages never expire and roll over indefinitely.

q3.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
q3.answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime from your account settings. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

q4.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q4.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for enterprise plans.

q5.question: How is the Enterprise plan priced?
q5.answer: Enterprise pricing is customized based on your specific needs, including expected usage, custom features, and support requirements. Contact our sales team for a quote.

q6.question: Do unused credits accumulate?
q6.answer: Monthly subscription credits do not roll over. However, purchased credit packages never expire and accumulate with your balance.

q7.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
q7.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, while downgrades take effect at the start of your next billing period.

q8.question: Is there a refund policy?
q8.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for first-time subscribers. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund within 30 days of purchase.
